docs.lead_paragraph: The ability of Britain’s top soccer clubs to sign and retain some international stars would be complicated should the country leave the European Union. Rugby and cricket teams could also be affected.
docs.abstract: British soccer, rugby and cricket clubs are preparing themselves for effects of UK's exit from European Union, which could make acquiring international players from Europe more difficult and expensive.

headline.main: British Soccer Teams Brace for the Impact of ‘Brexit’
